ontology.doc_description: The name of the ontology to be used. At the present time it is okay to leave this blank and use a term that is outside an ontology.

ontology_name.doc_description: The name of tag in the ontology. If an ontology is specified, this `ontology_name` must match a word in the ontology.

ontology_id.doc_description: The ID of the word in the ontology. If an ontology is specified, the ID must match the ID of the word or element `ontology_name` in the ontology.

value_string.doc_description: A string-based field that may be associated with the tag. May be blank.

value_float.doc_description: A numeric value that can be associated with a tag. NaN by default.
